text: The 1959 SANFL Grand Final was an Australian rules football competition. beat 87 to 77 to claim its sixth consecutive premiership. ==Scorecard== == Six-in- a-row == By winning the 1959 SANFL Grand Final, Port Adelaide set a senior Australian rules football record winning six consecutive Grand Finals. == References == Category:SANFL Grand Finals SANFL Grand Final, 1959
title: 1959 SANFL Grand Final
